meanings.sent1: The robot had an armatured design for added strength.
meanings.sent2: The armatured machine was able to withstand heavy loads.
meanings.sent3: The armatured armor made the knight look like a walking fortress.
meanings.sent4: Her armatured determination to succeed propelled her forward.
meanings.sent5: The armatured structure stood tall against the strong winds.

meanings.definition: Covered or protected by an armature.
meanings.sent1: The armatured wires were shielded from external damage.
meanings.sent2: The delicate mechanism was armatured to prevent any harm.
meanings.sent3: The armatured shield gleamed in the sunlight, reflecting its protective nature.
meanings.sent4: His armatured heart was guarded against further pain.
meanings.sent5: The armatured casing kept the precious contents safe inside.
